author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content:
<@412614104222531604> we have merged the missing PR adding support for historical summaries and Teku is now now compliant with refrence tests 1.3.0-rc0.
Our develop docker image should be ready for the updated testnet: consensys/teku:develop

author: siladu
content:
- besu already conforms to this EIP-3860 spec change: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6249
- Not sure when we could have SSZ ready for, certainly not this week
- PR 146/218 getPayloadBodies* implementation has just started so unlikely to be ready this week, but maybe next week.

...so no changes for besu since withdrawals-devnet-1 so you can useful the same image:
 `docker pull siladu/besu:22.10.3-SNAPSHOT-openjdk-11-debug-withdrawals-evm-0455b22` 
(built from https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/4818)

cc <@412614104222531604>

author: marekm3498
content: I guess the problem is with the last block before the Capella. CL is sending payload attributes with post-Capella timestamp, so ELs expect withdrawals to produce the block. On the other hand, the current head is pre-Capella (Capella - 1), but payload attributes are referring to the blocks which will be produced
